 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּפָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==storm-wind== (that ***makes an end ?***); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Isa.5.28|Isa 5:28]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּפָּ֫תָה‎</span> [[Hos.8.7|Hos 8:7]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:90f»§ 90f</sup>.); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּפָֽתְךָ‎</span> [[Ps.83.16|Ps 83:16]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּפוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.21.1|Isa 21:1]] — ***strom-wind***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּסַעַר בְּיוֺם ס‎</span> [[Amos.1.14|Amos 1:14]]; [[Nah.1.3|Nah 1:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂעָרָה‎</span>), [[Isa.17.13|Isa 17:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ‎</span>), [[Job.37.9|Job 37:9]]; [[Isa.21.1|Isa 21:1]], as driving chaff [[Job.21.18|Job 21:18]] (verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּנַב‎</span>; in simile), simile of rushing chariots [[Isa.5.28|Isa 5:28]]; [[Isa.66.15|Isa 66:15]]; [[Jer.4.13|Jer 4:13]], of ruin [[Prov.1.27|Prov 1:27]] compare [[Prov.10.25|Prov 10:25]] symbolic of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s judgments, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְצֹ֑רוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ יִזְרָ֖עוּ וְס‎</span> [[Hos.8.7|Hos 8:7]]; [[Ps.83.16|Ps 83:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַעַר‎</span>), [[Job.27.20|Job 27:20]] (verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּנַב‎</span>), [[Isa.29.6|Isa 29:6]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעָרָה‎</span>). 

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּפָה‎</span> **proper name, of a location** ==East of Jordan==; — only in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָהֵב בְּס‎</span> in ancient poetry fragment [[Num.21.14|Num 21:14]] [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>Moab 50</sup> compare <abbr title="transliteration"><u>S¹fieh</u></abbr> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), southeast oasis of Dead Sea, but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is most improbable
